title.narrative: More women lead and participate in peace processes, humanitarian action, and disaster risk reduction

description.narrative: The outcome will focus on promoting women’s increased leadership and participation in peace processes, humanitarian action, and disaster risk reduction. The work under this outcome will: (a) increase the leadership capacity and influence of women, women’s networks and CSOs at the Union and State levels in formal and informal peace and security processes, conflict prevention and resolution at union and state/regional levels; (b) strengthen key peace actors’ capacities and common understanding in support of gender-responsive actions towards peacebuilding, social cohesion, safety and security at union and state/regional levels; and (c) enable women and women’s groups affected by disasters, conflict and displacement to influence and access protection, recovery, resilience-building for themselves and their families.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan
Norad - Norwegian Agency for Development Cooperation
United Nations Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)
